review: Let's me view anything on my LG G FLEX 2! I use Miracast to project  it
author: Luis Teodoro

review: This is our third Chromecast have one on each TV in our home.  Very nice little tool that is reasonably priced
author: JGorski

review: Amazing product. Sometimes has some weird behavior. For example, gets async between the chromecast and the mobile app for Netflix. Power off and back on the TV solves the little inconvenient.But most of the time works great.
author: Dario Quintana

review: As far as I am aware, it doesn't have 5Ghz support. Claimed to be getting it but doesn't have it.
author: Myke

review: The device came quickly and in pristine condition.  I loved my first Chromecast so much, I needed to have one for my second TV.
author: David Stratton "Bookisatva"

review: Great for Youtube and Netflix - does NOT have a power button, so it's constantly on.
author: TheBaldEagle
